column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Asami says : " Hi . "
#Text=Mako says : " Did you come by to tell me how paranoid I am ? "
#Text=Asami says : " No .
#Text=" Asami says : " Maybe you need a night off .
#Text=Why do n't we go get some dinner ?
#Text=" Mako says : " No , thanks .
#Text=I 'm a little busy .
#Text=" Asami says : " Too busy for Kwong 's Cuisine ?
#Text=Remember ?
#Text=We had our first date there .
#Text=" Mako says : " Maybe I do need to get my mind off things .
#Text=" Lu says : " Police !
#Text=Hey , Mako .
#Text=Hope we did n't interrupt you two lovebirds .
#Text=" Mako says : " What 's going on ?
#Text=" Lu says : " We busted some Triple Threats who said you hired them for a job .
#Text=" Mako says : " All right .
#Text=It 's true .
#Text=We were trying to figure out who stole Asami 's stuff , so we hired them for a sting operation .
#Text=I 'm sorry for going behind your back .
#Text=" Lin says : " According to the Triple Threats , you did more than that .
#Text=They said you helped them steal a warehouse full of Future Industries property .
#Text=" Asami says : " That 's crazy !
#Text=" Mako says : " You 're gon na believe a bunch of criminals ?
#Text=" Lin says : " I have to follow up on a lead .
#Text=" Lu says : " Well , looky what I found : cash ... And these .
#Text=" Lin says : " What are you doing with explosives , Mako ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't know where those came from .
#Text=" Gang says : " You 're under arrest .
#Text=" Mako says : " None of that is mine .
#Text=" Gang says : " Yeah .
#Text=Should 've known you 'd hook up with your old pals .
#Text=Once a Triple Threat , always a Triple Threat .
#Text=" Asami says : " This has to be a mistake .
#Text=" Lu says : " Sorry to break the news to you , sweetie , but your boyfriend 's just a crooked cop .
#Text=That sting operation was just a way to lure you away from your warehouse .
#Text=" Gang says : " He was using you the whole time .
#Text=" Mako says : " That 's not true , Asami .
#Text=I would never do anything to hurt you .
#Text=It 's Varrick .
#Text=This is all Varrick .
#Text=He set me up !
#Text=" Gang says : " Yeah , it 's Varrick 's fault .
#Text=Varrick .
#Text=Varrick .
#Text="
